article.title: Booz Allen Hamilton Receives Contract with U.S. Pacific Command
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Booz Allen Hamilton has been awarded a cost plus fixed fee contract for approximately $9,455,370 to provide U.S. Pacific Command with operations and transformation analysis. The 55th Contracting Squadron, Defense Technical Information Center, Offutt Air Force Base, Nebraska, is the contracting activity.
